name: Feedback Sports Alpine Digital Scale
description: You work hard to optimize your own strength-to-weight ratio. Do the same with your ride. This digital scale clamps to any bicycle repair stand or hangs from a hook to weigh your bike, wheels, and components.Rubber coated hook protects your frame's finish and prevents bike from sliding.Rubber housing is shock-resistant.Easy to read LCD displayFor small parts, hang a tray or bag on the hook and re-zero the scale.Measures up to 25kg, displays metric or imperial, with 0.005% accuracy.Auto shut-off saves powerUses 4 AAA batteries (included).
